mapper.select: select cmpy_seq, cmpy_name, FN_CODE_NAME(TYPE_CODE, 'PK') AS cmpy_type_name from CMPY_TB where CMPY_CODE = '0000' and STATE != 'D' order by cmpy_name asc;
select cmpy_seq, cmpy_name from CMPY_TB where CMPY_CODE = '1000' and STATE != 'D' order by cmpy_name asc;

SELECT c.CMPY_SEQ, c.CMPY_NAME FROM CMPY_RELATION_TB r INNER JOIN CMPY_TB c ON r.CHILD_CMPY_SEQ = c.CMPY_SEQ WHERE r.PARENT_CMPY_SEQ = #{cmpySeq} AND r.STATE != 'D' AND c.STATE != 'D' AND c.CMPY_CODE = '1000' ORDER BY c.CMPY_NAME ASC;
SELECT CMPY_SEQ, CMPY_NAME, CMPNY_IDNTF, BSNS_RGNMB, CRPRT_RGNMB, RPRSN, RSDNT_RGNMB, CMPY_PHONE, ADDR, ENG_ADDR FROM CMPY_TB WHERE CMPY_SEQ = #{cmpySeq} ;

-- ▶ 내 회사의 담당자 정보 조회 SELECT '고객사' AS CMPY_TYPE_NAME, -- 내 회사 유형 m.CMPY_MNG_SEQ, m.CMPY_SEQ, m.NAME, FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(IFNULL(m.PHONE, '')) AS PHONE, FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(IFNULL(m.TEL, '')) AS TEL, FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(IFNULL(m.FAX, '')) AS FAX, m.EMAIL FROM CMPY_TB c
INNER JOIN CMPY_MNG_TB m ON m.CMPY_SEQ = c.CMPY_SEQ AND m.STATE != 'D'
WHERE c.CMPY_SEQ = #{cmpySeq} AND c.STATE != 'D'
UNION ALL
-- ▶ 상위 회사의 담당자 정보 조회 SELECT FN_CODE_NAME(p.TYPE_CODE, 'PK') AS CMPY_TYPE_NAME, -- 상위회사 유형 m.CMPY_MNG_SEQ, m.CMPY_SEQ, m.NAME, FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(IFNULL(m.PHONE, '')) AS PHONE, FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(IFNULL(m.TEL, '')) AS TEL, FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(IFNULL(m.FAX, '')) AS FAX, m.EMAIL FROM CMPY_RELATION_TB r
INNER JOIN CMPY_TB p ON r.PARENT_CMPY_SEQ = p.CMPY_SEQ AND p.STATE != 'D'
INNER JOIN CMPY_MNG_TB m ON m.CMPY_SEQ = p.CMPY_SEQ AND p.STATE != 'D'
WHERE r.PARENT_CMPY_SEQ = #{prtnSeq} AND r.STATE != 'D'

SELECT TOP_CD, IFNULL ((SELECT sub.TYPE_NAME FROM COMCODE_TB sub WHERE sub.TOP_CD = '00' AND sub.TYPE_CD = COMCODE_TB.TOP_CD), '최상위코드') TOP_NAME, TYPE_CD, TYPE_NAME FROM COMCODE_TB WHERE 1=1 AND TYPE_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{code},'%') ORDER BY TOP_CD
SELECT type_cd, type_name, memo FROM COMCODE_TB WHERE use_yn = 1 AND top_cd = #{code} ORDER BY DIS_ORDR, COMCODE_SEQ;
select dept_seq , name from DEPT_TB where 1=1 and state != 'D' and TEST_YN = 1 order by oder
select id , mem_name from MEMBER_TB where 1=1 and state != 'D' and REV_YN = 1 and work_state = '1' and dept_seq = #{deptSeq};
SELECT MEMBER_SEQ, ID, MEM_NAME FROM MEMBER_TB WHERE 1=1 AND STATE != 'D' /*and REV_YN = 1*/ AND WORK_STATE = '1' AND DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq};
mapper.update: UPDATE JOB_TB SET STATE_CODE = #{stateCode}, STATE_UDT_DT = NOW() WHERE JOB_SEQ = #{jobSeq}
UPDATE JOB_TB SET MNG_ID = #{mngId}, UDT_DT = NOW() WHERE JOB_SEQ = #{jobSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOB_MNGR_TB ( JOB_SEQ, MNG_ID, MEMO, INS_MEM_ID, UDT_MEM_ID ) VALUES ( #{jobSeq}, #{mngId}, #{memo}, #{insMemId}, #{udtMemId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(JOB_MNGR_TB.INS_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') instDtStr,
FN_DEPT_NAME(JOB_MNGR_TB.MNG_ID) memPos, MEMBER_TB.MEM_NAME memName,
FN_DEPT_NAME(JOB_MNGR_TB.INS_MEM_ID) insPos, ins.MEM_NAME insName, IFNULL (memo, '') MEMO
FROM JOB_MNGR_TB
INNER JOIN MEMBER_TB ON JOB_MNGR_TB.MNG_ID = MEMBER_TB.ID
INNER JOIN MEMBER_TB ins ON JOB_MNGR_TB.INS_MEM_ID = ins.ID
WHERE 1=1 AND JOB_MNGR_TB.JOB_SEQ = #{jobSeq} ORDER BY JOB_MNGR_SEQ DESC
SELECT ID , MEM_NAME , PHONE , CONCAT(EMAIL, '@standardbank.co.kr') EMAIL FROM MEMBER_TB WHERE 1=1 AND STATE != 'D' AND WORK_STATE = '1' /* 재직 */ AND LOCK_YN = 0 /* 계정활성 */ ORDER BY MEM_NAME

SELECT ID , MEM_NAME , PHONE , CONCAT(EMAIL, '@standardbank.co.kr') EMAIL FROM MEMBER_TB WHERE 1=1 AND STATE != 'D' AND WORK_STATE = '1' /* 재직 */ AND MNG_YN = 1 /* 업무담당자여부 */ AND LOCK_YN = 0 /* 계정활성 */ ORDER BY MEM_NAME
